message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I am offering it at a special introductory price of $1200000. This is a unique opportunity to secure an asset worth $1500000 at a competitive rate.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price of $1200000. I am willing to pay up to $1050000 for this product.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In light of that, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer for the product is $1100000.
